greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: O.g.f.: Sum_{n>=0} 1/(1-n*x)^n * x^n/n! * exp(-x/(1-n*x)).
comment: Compare g.f. to the curious identity:
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} Stirling2(n-k, k) * C(n-1, k-1) for n>0 with a(0)=1. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 30 2014
example: simplifies to a power series in x with integer coefficients.
program: (PARI) /* From a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} Stirling2(n-k, k) * C(-1, k-1) */
{Stirling2(n, k) = sum(j=0, k, (-1)^(k+j) * binomial(k, j) * j^n) / k!}
{a(n)=if(n==0, 1, sum(k=1, n, Stirling2(n-k, k) * binomial(n-1, k-1)))}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Nov 04 2012
